Audio.Author: João Gava
Audio.Comments: Um indivíduo atraído por playback, se aproximou silenciosamente e iniciou a vocalização gravada após 4 minutos do uso do playback, floresta secundária com presença de bovinos no seu interior / One individual attracted by playback, it approached silently and started the recorded vocal after 4 minutes of playback use, secondary forest with the presence of cattle inside.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
